text: Philip Whalley Allison was a fencer from USA. Philip competed in the team foil event at the 1924 Summer Olympics. He was born on May 21, 1889 and died on July, 5 1982.Philip Allison == References == Category:1889 births Category:1982 deaths Category:American fencers Category:Olympians for the United States Category:Sportspeople from Washington (state)
title: Philip Allison
